Package org.jetel.graph

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IGraphElement
    This interface should be implemented by all elements living in a transformation graph - - components - connections - lookup tables - sequences - metadata - ...
    InputPort
    An interface defining operations expected from InputPort object.
    InputPortDirect
    An interface defining operations expected from InputPortDirect object This interface is complementary to InputPort.
    OutputPort
    An interface defining operations expected from OutputPort object Output port establishes unidirectional communication channel between two NODEs.
    OutputPortDirect
    An interface defining operations expected from OutputPortDirect object This interface is complementary to OutputPort.
    SubgraphComponent
    Only implementation of this interface is Subgraph component.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BufferedEdge
    A class that represents Edge - data connection between two NODEs.
    BufferedFastPropagateEdge
    This edge implementation ensures that written data records are immediately available for reading thread (fast-propagate) and ensures that writing operation never blocks the writing thread - internal unlimited cache is used.
    ConcurrentInputPort  
    ConcurrentOutputPort
    Simple wrapper around common direct output port.
    ContextProvider
    This class should be able to provide org.jetel.graph.Node or org.jetel.graph.TransformationGraph corresponding to the current thread.
    ContextProvider.Context
    This class represents all context information managed by ContextProvider.
    DirectEdge
    A class that represents DirectEdge - data connection between two NODEs.
    DirectEdgeFastPropagate
    A class that represents DirectEdge - data connection between two NODEs.
    Edge
    A class that represents Edge Proxy - surrogate which directs calls to apropriate Edge implementation according to edge type specification
    EdgeBase
    A class that represents Edge - data connection between two NODEs
    EdgeDebuger
    This class perform buffering data flowing through the edge.
    EdgeDebugReader
    This class reads data records written by EdgeDebugWriter.
    EdgeDebugWriter
    This class writes data records to an OutputStream, the data records can be read by EdgeDebugReader.
    EdgeFactory
    This factory class is intended to be used for factorisation of graph edges.
    GraphElement
    Ascendant of all elements, which can be put into transformation graph.
    GraphParameter
    This class represents single graph parameter - name-value pair, which is used to resolve all ${PARAM_NAME} references in grf files.
    GraphParameter.ComponentReference  
    GraphParameter.SingleType  
    GraphParameters
    Container for all graph parameters associated with a transformation graph.
    JobflowEdge
    This edge implementation is used in case the graph is running with jobflow GraphNature.
    LRemoteEdge
    This edge represents the "left" side of a remote edge, used by graph running splitted on cluster.
    Node
    A class that represents atomic transformation task.
    Phase
    A class that represents processing Phase of Transformation Graph
    PhaseConnectionEdge
    A class that represents PhaseConnectionEdge - data connection between two NODEs in different Phases.
    RRemoteDirectEdge
    NOTE: this edge type is not used for now This class represents the "right" side of a remote edge, which is used in cluster run of graphs.
    TransformationGraph
    A class that represents Transformation Graph - all the Nodes and connecting Edges
    TransformationGraphAnalyzer
    A class that analyzes relations between Nodes and Edges of the Transformation Graph
    TransformationGraphXMLReaderWriter
    Helper class which reads transformation graph definition from XML data The XML DTD describing the internal structure is as follows: <!
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    JobType
    This enumeration represents various kind of jobs from clover engine family.
    Result
    Enum of different runtime results with numeric codes and string indetifications of results.
